subject: Yankee Stadium (NYC)
Baseball
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: George Steinbrenner, who was sitting in an owner’s suite with his wife, was emotional after receiving the applause before the first game at the new Yankee Stadium.
snippet: George Steinbrenner, who was sitting in an owner’s suite with his wife, was emotional after receiving the applause before the first game at the new Yankee Stadium.
